key.name: saved-local
key.description: A list of local sessions to connect.

key.name: size
key.summary: Width and height of the main window.
key.description: Last width and height of the main window in pixels.

key.name: position
key.description: Last x and y position of the main window in pixels.

key.name: font
key.description: The typeface used for the terminal window.

key.name: max-data-rate
key.description: The maximum rate at which data can be blasted at the terminal before it will go into overload mode.

key.name: decay-constant
key.summary: The proportion for which the current sample affects the effective data rate.
key.description: The maximum data rate is computed by taking a weighted mean between the current instantaneous data rate and the previous data rate. This constant determines the relative importance of those two rates.
